title: Premium Dripless Hanukkah Candles Multi Blues Frosted Thin Tapered Chanukah Candle Set of 45 Enough for Eight Nights of Hanukah Includes a DIY Dreidel, Prayer Card with Chanukah Song - Aviv Judaica
features: Beautiful, traditional Hanukkah candles. Celebrate the light of freedom during the festival of lights with Winter colored candles.
Decorative and beautiful - The candles are colored in spectacular Multi blue tone colors with a frosted finish. Each candle is neatly hand dipped.
This set includes 45 deluxe tapered candles, enough for all of the eight nights of Chanukah, including the Shamash (servant) lecht.
Complete Candle Lighting Set - We added to the candle bundle a Prayer card which includes the 3 Blessings recited when lighting the Chanukah Lecht and a unique DIY Dreidel that can spin!
The candles measure 5.75" inch long (14.6 cm) and 0.36" Diameter (9 cm) The candles fit most menorahs. Burns approximately 1 Hour enough time to fulfill the Mitzvah.
Shine Bright - To achieve a neat burning candle, trim the wick a 0.25" before lightning.
Dripless When placed not too close to another candle and in a room without a draft.
description: Winter theme frosted Chanukkah candles. An additional candle we add each night, they shed a bright sweet light, to remind us of the victory by the Maccabees won with might. Gather around the Menorah and Ma'oz Tzur we will recite, with Gelt and Latkes to everyone's delight, spin the dreidel and on the Gimmel get it right. Happy Hanukkah! Beautiful, traditional Hanukkah candles. Celebrate the light of freedom during the festival of lights Dripless - Please take in mind placing lit candles too close to each other or near a draft may cause dripping.
